name: Mahjong 主 Master (Ads free)
description:
Are you often stressed or need a break? With Mahjong Master Path you can play some relaxing rounds of Mahjong. Recharge your mental batteries and enjoy the easy and relaxing game play of this wonderful Mahjong game. Beautiful backgrounds, enjoyable animations and sounds will relax your mind. Follow the Mahjong Master on his peaceful path.

+ Many different chapters and levels waiting for you.
+ No annoying in-game ads. Just pure gameplay.
+ Beautifully, designed hand-drawn backgrounds.
+ 8 different chapters with over 400 boards to solve.
+ Listen to enjoyable music and watch relaxing animations.
+ In-App-Purchase lets you unlock all chapters.
+ Relaxing Zen Mode
+ Three difficulty modes
+ Zoomable game boards
+ If you like to relax even further, try the included meditation mode.
+ Increase your rank by collecting rare artifacts.
+ Replay levels as often as you want to increase your rings and rank.
+ Watch your game and level statistics.
+ Game Center support with Leaderboards and Achievements.
+ Looks awesome on your new iPhone 11 Pro and iPad Pro.

We hope you enjoy this game!
